name: Witch Way (kha1i1io)
description:
A witch is casting a powerful spell, but it takes 20 seconds to cast! Use your laser to push back the horde of monsters while dealing damage!

This is my first  "complete" game done for the 20 Second game jam. I focused entirely on the programming side, so it is made completely out of free assets found around the web.

Controls:

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Fire laser

...That's it.

Credits: Witch

9E0

Enemies
